content.text: Hi there, how is your day going?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! Just graduated college this past weekend, so I'm feeling pretty good about life right now.
Oh wow, congratulations! What did you major in?
Education, I'm going to be a teacher!
That's awesome! I have a lot of respect for teachers, they do a lot of important work.
Thanks! I'm really excited to start my career, but I'm also a little nervous.
I'm sure you'll do great! You seem like a smart and capable person.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'm trying to stay positive and excited about the future.
That's the best way to be! I'm sure you'll have a lot of success in your career.
I hope so! Thanks for talking with me, I really appreciate it.
No problem, it was my pleasure! Have a great day!
